title: Can I write a 15-page paper in one night? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes it is possible. I have written 12 to 18 pages before. I ‘fool’ the brain. This is how. I tell the brain that we are writing 3 pages. It will get excited and work towards 3 pages. Then I tell it we are making it 8 pages. By now we are left with 7 pages. I keep on adding a little till we are done. In fact towards the end, I will be striving to finish the few pages remaining
You surely can. All you need is: A lot of motivation A lot of coffee and lightning speed of writing/typing. and boom you will be done in a night.
